name: ZUNDAMON_Talking_Tutorial
description:
ZUNDAMON Talking Tutorial

"ZUNDAMON Talking Tutorial" is a tutorial for using lip sync data in Defold.
*lip sync and voice create tool
VOICEVOX
https://voicevox.hiroshiba.jp/
*Game engine
Defold[ver.1.4.1]
https://defold.com/

Control
